title: 12 Days of Christmas: Naughty or Nice?
description: This holiday season get ready to settle down by the fire with a glass of wine, your kindle, and this fantastic anthology of erotic short stories from 12 of your favorite up and coming indie authors. Enchanting Publications brings you 12 sizzling short stories to make your toes curl on a cold winterâ€™s night. The proceeds of this anthology will be donated to the American Cancer Society.
author: Eva Simone
